title: Topics in Computing
description:
The aim of this module is to provide a platform for innovative topics in computing that are not part of the regular curriculum to be presented to the students. This may include topics that are taught due to the availability of
a visiting expert, new developments in an area, or a particular event such as a competition that can be used to impart appropriate education to the students. The module may be offered as graded or CS/CU as appropriate to the topic.
prerequisite: Depends on the topic being offered.
